title: Google\Cloud\RecaptchaEnterprise\V1\AnnotateAssessmentRequest
name: AnnotateAssessmentRequest
description:
The request message to annotate an Assessment.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.recaptchaenterprise.v1.AnnotateAssessmentRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the Assessment, in the format "projects/{project}/assessments/{assessment}".

params.name: data.annotation
params.description: Optional. The annotation that will be assigned to the Event. This field can be left empty to provide reasons that apply to an event without concluding whether the event is legitimate or fraudulent.

params.name: data.reasons
params.description: Optional. Optional reasons for the annotation that will be assigned to the Event.

params.name: data.hashed_account_id
params.description: Optional. Optional unique stable hashed user identifier to apply to the assessment. This is an alternative to setting the hashed_account_id in CreateAssessment, for example when the account identifier is not yet known in the initial request. It is recommended that the identifier is hashed using hmac-sha256 with stable secret.

methods.name: getHashedAccountId
methods.description:
Optional. Optional unique stable hashed user identifier to apply to the assessment.

This is an alternative to setting the hashed_account_id in CreateAssessment, for example when the account identifier is not yet known in the initial request. It is recommended that the identifier is hashed using hmac-sha256 with stable secret.
